rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment provides a factual statement about transmission without high-potency language.
Describes status/risk ('no indication of human-to-human transmission').
Segment does not contain a question.
The segment reports a positive fact (no indication) but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment states 'no indication of human-to-human transmission' but does not use a minimiser with scale contrast.
The segment contains the bare negation 'no indication of human-to-human transmission' without an explicit calming cue.
